short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you want an uninterrupted place to be.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a browser extension to open a current URL tab in a new incognito window. Avoid getting locked out of paid articles, websites asking you to stop AdBlock on your browser and such scenarios.
